name: abstract_gears_background.jpg
description: A full, detailed background image of an abstract, dark, industrial scene filled with interlocking metallic gears and cogs, with subtle volumetric lighting.

name: bright_sky.jpg
description: A full background image of a bright, clear blue sky with a few fluffy white clouds and the sun shining brightly, creating a positive and hopeful atmosphere.

name: city-background.jpg
description: A full background image of a sprawling, modern city skyline at dusk, with lights beginning to twinkle in the buildings against a deep purple and orange sky.

name: rainy-city.jpg
description: A full background image of a city street at night in heavy rain, with neon lights from storefronts reflecting on the wet asphalt and a moody, cinematic feel.

name: city_background.jpg
description: A full background image of a bustling city during the day, shot from a high angle, showing traffic and pedestrians moving through a dense urban landscape.

name: tech_city_background.jpg
description: A full background image of a futuristic, high-tech city at night, with holographic advertisements, flying vehicles, and glowing circuit board patterns on the sides of massive skyscrapers.

name: sunrise-field.jpg
description: A full background image of a serene, golden sunrise over a vast, open field of wheat, with warm light rays breaking through a light morning mist.

name: tech_cityscape.jpg
description: A full background image of a clean, sleek, technological cityscape under a clear blue sky, featuring minimalist architecture and integrated green spaces.

name: blueprint_bg.jpg
description: A full background image of a detailed, complex engineering blueprint, with white lines and technical drawings on a deep blue background.

name: data_center_background.jpg
description: A full background image looking down a long, cool-toned aisle of a modern data center, with rows of server racks and blinking LED lights.

name: dark_clouds.jpg
description: A full background image of a dramatic, dark, and stormy sky filled with heavy, ominous clouds, suggesting an impending storm.

name: winding-path.jpg
description: A full background image of a stone path winding through a lush, green forest, with sunlight filtering through the canopy of trees.

name: sky-background.jpg
description: A full background image of a beautiful, peaceful sunset sky with vibrant gradients of orange, pink, and purple.

name: empty_city_street_background.jpg
description: A full background image of a completely empty, wide city street in a major metropolis at dawn with soft light, creating an eerie, post-apocalyptic feeling.

name: data-center-background.jpg
description: A full background image of a high-tech server room with glowing blue lights, focusing on the intricate cables and hardware of a server rack.

name: server-room.jpg
description: A full background image from a low angle inside a vast, modern server room, emphasizing the scale and power of the rows of humming server racks.

name: gears-background.png
description: A collection of colourful, intricately detailed metallic gears and cogs of various sizes, layered to create a sense of depth, in a white background.

name: mountains-far.png
description: A series of colourful, majestic mountain ranges fading into the distance, with sharp peaks and blue and purple hues, in a white background.

name: gears-midground.png
description: An assembly of large, colourful, interconnected industrial gears made of brass and steel, appearing to be part of a complex machine, in a white background.

name: stock-chart-midground.png
description: A colourful, glowing 3D stock market line chart showing a dramatic upward trend, rendered with a neon green line, in a white background.

name: single-tree.png
description: A single, large, colourful oak tree with a full, vibrant green canopy and a thick, sturdy trunk, standing alone, in a white background.

name: falling-chart.png
description: A colourful, glowing 3D stock market bar chart showing a steep, dramatic decline, with red bars getting progressively smaller, in a white background.

name: city-skyline-mid.png
description: The silhouette of a colourful, modern city skyline with various skyscrapers and buildings, rendered in shades of blue and purple, in a white background.

name: modern_city.png
description: A collection of colourful, sleek, futuristic skyscrapers with glass facades reflecting light, arranged to look like a city block, in a white background.

name: amazon_warehouse_midground.png
description: The interior of a massive, colourful Amazon fulfillment center, showing rows of tall shelves packed with products and conveyor belts, in a white background.

name: cloud_servers_midground.png
description: A colourful, stylized representation of cloud computing, with several fluffy white clouds interconnected by glowing blue data streams, in a white background.

name: fortress.png
description: A large, colourful, ancient stone fortress with high walls, imposing towers, and a single large gate, viewed from a slightly low angle, in a white background.

name: server-racks-midground.png
description: A row of colourful, detailed, modern server racks with visible blinking lights, cooling fans, and neatly arranged cables, in a white background.

name: broken_gears.png
description: A pile of colourful, rusted, and broken metal gears and machine parts, with some cogs having missing teeth, conveying a sense of decay, in a white background.

name: buildings_midground.png
description: A row of colourful, generic city office buildings of varying heights, viewed from street level, in a white background.

name: forest-midground.png
description: A dense line of colourful, tall pine trees creating a forest edge, with layers of trees to give a sense of depth, in a white background.

name: data_overlay_foreground.png
description: A colourful, semi-transparent overlay of glowing, futuristic digital information, including charts, graphs, and lines of code, in a white background.

name: buildings-foreground.png
description: The detailed, colourful facades of a few modern city buildings, shot from a low angle to appear large and close to the viewer, in a white background.

name: glowing-data.png
description: A colourful, abstract stream of glowing digital data particles and light trails, flowing dynamically from one point to another, in a white background.

name: soundwaves_overlay.png
description: A colourful, semi-transparent overlay of stylized, vibrant soundwaves or equalizer bars, pulsing rhythmically, in a white background.

name: delivery_drone_foreground.png
description: A colourful, futuristic delivery drone with propellers spinning, carrying a small package, viewed from a dynamic, three-quarter angle as if in flight, in a white background.

name: digital_grid.png
description: A colourful, glowing, semi-transparent perspective grid made of bright blue lines, receding into the distance to create a sense of digital space, in a white background.

name: cracked_glass_overlay.png
description: A colourful, semi-transparent overlay showing a spiderweb pattern of cracks across a pane of glass, as if the screen is shattered, in a white background.

name: biohazard_symbol_overlay.png
description: The iconic, colourful, bright yellow and black biohazard symbol, designed as a semi-transparent overlay with a slight glow, in a white background.

name: amazon_box_foreground.png
description: A colourful, standard Amazon cardboard shipping box with the smile logo, sealed with tape and viewed from an isometric angle, in a white background.

name: sad-people.png
description: A colourful, diverse group of people with sad, worried expressions, looking downcast, representing economic hardship, in a white background.

name: glowing_particles.png
description: A colourful, scattered cloud of soft, glowing dust-like particles or embers, floating gently in the air, to be used as an overlay, in a white background.

name: data_stream.png
description: A vibrant, colourful, abstract stream of binary code and light streaks flowing in a cohesive current, in a white background.

name: rain_overlay.png
description: A colourful, semi-transparent overlay of falling raindrops and water streaks, to simulate viewing through a rainy window, in a white background.

name: phoenix_from_ashes.png
description: A magnificent, colourful phoenix with fiery orange and red wings, rising powerfully from a pile of grey ashes, symbolizing rebirth, in a white background.

name: gears-foreground.png
description: A few large, colourful, highly-detailed metallic gears positioned close to the viewer, with sharp focus and intricate textures, in a white background.

name: resilient-plant.png
description: A small, colourful, vibrant green sprout pushing its way up through a crack in dry, grey concrete, symbolizing resilience, in a white background.

name: data_stream_foreground.png
description: A dense, colourful, and dynamic stream of glowing digital data flowing directly towards the viewer, creating a sense of immersion, in a white background.

name: aws-logo.png
description: The official, colourful Amazon Web Services (AWS) logo, clean and sharp, in a white background.

name: tech-overlay-foreground.png
description: A colourful, semi-transparent futuristic user interface (UI) overlay with glowing holographic elements, dials, and data readouts, in a white background.
